ai-patthana10.12:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.12:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of self-defection, and so on,
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_2: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_3: don’t give rise to repulsion regarding the teaching.
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_4: Not for the sake of livelihood, not for the sake of resentment, or for the sake of the flood, nor for the sake of repulsion, because of the cause, and for the sake of (good) services.
ai-patthana10.12:1.1_5: don’t give rise to repulsion regarding the teaching.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_0: Not for the sake of resenting the teaching, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_1: Not for the sake of resenting the teaching, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_2: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion regarding what is not the cause or condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_3: don’t give rise to repulsion regarding the teaching.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_4: Not for the sake of resentment, not for the sake of surmounting the flood, and without the cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.12:2.1_5: Not for the sake of resentment, not for the sake of suspending the teaching, nor for the sake of repulsion, and for the sake of this misapprehension of the answers, and because of the cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.12:3.1_0: Not for the sake of resenting the teaching, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:4.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of livelihood, nor for the sake of function, or for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of this teaching.
ai-patthana10.12:5.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of livelihood, nor for the sake of the sake of function, and not for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana10.12:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana10.12:6.1_0: the thirty-two objects of the company ...
ai-patthana10.12:7.1_0: Not for the sake of not grasping, nor for the sake of livelihood, or for the sake of function of repulsion, views, causes, conditions for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana10.12:8.1_0: don’t give rise to satisfaction for the sake of neither someone nor have impingement.
ai-patthana10.12:9.1_0: Neither have no cause or condition.
ai-patthana10.12:10.1_0: with no support for the sake of interruption of unconcealed mind.
ai-patthana10.12:11.1_0: Not for the sake of non-grasping and understanding,
ai-patthana10.12:12.1_0: Not for the sake of neither giver nor those underlying tendencies. ...
ai-patthana10.12:12.1_1: Not for the sake of livelihood and no cause or condition.
ai-patthana10.12:12.1_2: Not for the sake of non-violence, or for the sake of sustained thought,
ai-patthana10.12:13.1_0: Not for the sake of intelligence, or for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana10.12:14.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood, nor for the sake of resentment,
ai-patthana10.12:15.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of livelihood, but only for the sake of all suffering.
